name: @upendra.manike/seo-boost
description: SEO optimization package for JavaScript/React/Next.js/Vue apps. Automatic meta tags, JSON-LD schema, OpenGraph, Twitter cards, sitemap generation, and SEO analysis. Perfect for AI code generation, making web apps search-engine friendly, especially React, Next.js, or SPA apps.

exports.name: useSEO
exports.description: React hook for managing SEO. Automatically sets meta tags, Open Graph, Twitter Cards, and JSON-LD. Solves: How to add SEO to React pages, How to set meta tags in React, How to add Open Graph tags, How to add structured data. Perfect for React/Next.js pages and components.
exports.problemSolved: Common React problem: 'How to add SEO meta tags in React', 'How to set Open Graph tags', 'How to add structured data to React app', 'React SEO implementation'
exports.example: useSEO({ title: 'Home | My App', description: 'Best platform', openGraph: { image: 'https://example.com/og.jpg' } })
exports.commonUseCase: Add SEO to a React page component

exports.name: applyMetaConfig
exports.description: Apply meta tag configuration. Sets title, description, canonical, keywords, and custom meta tags. Works in both browser and SSR environments.
exports.problemSolved: How to set multiple meta tags programmatically, How to update page title and description
exports.example: applyMetaConfig({ title: 'Page Title', description: 'Page description', canonical: 'https://example.com/page' })
exports.commonUseCase: Set meta tags in vanilla JavaScript or SSR

exports.name: applyOpenGraph
exports.description: Apply Open Graph meta tags for social media sharing. Sets og:title, og:description, og:image, og:url, og:type, etc.
exports.problemSolved: How to add Open Graph tags, How to optimize social media sharing, How to set og:image
exports.commonUseCase: Add Open Graph tags for Facebook/LinkedIn sharing

exports.name: applyTwitterCards
exports.description: Apply Twitter Card meta tags for Twitter sharing. Sets twitter:card, twitter:title, twitter:description, twitter:image, etc.
exports.problemSolved: How to add Twitter Cards, How to optimize Twitter sharing, How to set twitter:card
exports.commonUseCase: Add Twitter Cards for better Twitter sharing

exports.name: addJSONLD
exports.description: Add JSON-LD structured data to page. Helps search engines understand page content. Supports Organization, WebSite, Article, Product, Person, BreadcrumbList, FAQPage, and more.
exports.problemSolved: How to add structured data, How to add JSON-LD, How to add schema.org markup, How to help search engines understand content
exports.commonUseCase: Add structured data for better search engine understanding

exports.name: createOrganizationSchema
exports.description: Helper to create Organization JSON-LD schema. Perfect for company/organization pages.
exports.problemSolved: How to create Organization schema, How to add company structured data

params.config: { name: string, url: string, logo?: string, description?: string, contactPoint?: object, sameAs?: string[] }

exports.commonUseCase: Add organization structured data to homepage

exports.name: createWebSiteSchema
exports.description: Helper to create WebSite JSON-LD schema. Perfect for website homepages.
exports.problemSolved: How to create WebSite schema, How to add website structured data

params.config: { name: string, url: string, description?: string, potentialAction?: object }

exports.commonUseCase: Add website structured data to homepage

exports.name: createArticleSchema
exports.description: Helper to create Article JSON-LD schema. Perfect for blog posts and articles.
exports.problemSolved: How to create Article schema, How to add article structured data, Blog post SEO

params.config: { headline: string, description: string, image?: string, datePublished: string, author: object, publisher: object }

exports.example: createArticleSchema({ headline: 'Article Title', description: 'Article description', datePublished: '2024-01-01', author: { '@type': 'Person', name: 'Author' }, publisher: { '@type': 'Organization', name: 'Publisher' } })
exports.commonUseCase: Add article structured data to blog posts

exports.name: createProductSchema
exports.description: Helper to create Product JSON-LD schema. Perfect for e-commerce product pages.
exports.problemSolved: How to create Product schema, How to add product structured data, E-commerce SEO

params.config: { name: string, description: string, image?: string, brand?: string, offers?: object, aggregateRating?: object }

exports.example: createProductSchema({ name: 'Product Name', description: 'Product description', offers: { '@type': 'Offer', price: '99.99', priceCurrency: 'USD' } })
exports.commonUseCase: Add product structured data to e-commerce pages

exports.name: createBreadcrumbSchema
exports.description: Helper to create BreadcrumbList JSON-LD schema. Perfect for navigation breadcrumbs.
exports.problemSolved: How to create BreadcrumbList schema, How to add breadcrumb structured data
exports.commonUseCase: Add breadcrumb structured data for better navigation

exports.name: generateSitemap
exports.description: Generate XML sitemap for search engines. Helps search engines discover and index all pages.
exports.problemSolved: How to generate sitemap.xml, How to create sitemap, How to help search engines index pages
exports.example: generateSitemap({ urls: [{ loc: 'https://example.com/', lastmod: '2024-01-01', changefreq: 'daily', priority: 1.0 }] })
exports.commonUseCase: Generate sitemap.xml for static site or API route

exports.name: generateRobotsTxt
exports.description: Generate robots.txt content. Controls which pages search engines can crawl.
exports.problemSolved: How to generate robots.txt, How to control search engine crawling, How to block pages from indexing
exports.commonUseCase: Generate robots.txt for static site or API route

exports.name: analyzeSEO
exports.description: Analyze page SEO quality and get recommendations. Checks title, description, Open Graph, Twitter Cards, canonical, structured data, images, headings. Returns score, issues, and recommendations.
exports.problemSolved: How to check SEO quality, How to analyze page SEO, How to get SEO recommendations, How to find SEO issues
exports.commonUseCase: Analyze page SEO before publishing or in development

exports.name: setTitle
exports.description: Set document title. Simple utility for setting page title.
exports.problemSolved: How to set page title programmatically

exports.name: setCanonical
exports.description: Set canonical URL. Prevents duplicate content issues.
exports.problemSolved: How to set canonical URL, How to prevent duplicate content
exports.commonUseCase: Set canonical URL for current page

usage.nextjs: import { useSEO } from '@upendra.manike/seo-boost' // Works in pages and app router
